Klasse LoginService

java.lang.Object
com.spirit.application.service.LoginService
@Service public class LoginService extends Object
Service class for managing user logins. Includes methods for authentication, session management, and password handling.

  • Methodendetails

    • startSession

      public void startSession(UserDTO user)
      Starts a user session based on the user type (Student or Company).
      Parameter:
      user - the UserDTO of the logged-in user

    • login

      public User login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on username and password.
      Parameter:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Gibt zurück:
      the authenticated user, or null if authentication fails

    • isBlacklisted

      public boolean isBlacklisted(UserDTO user)
      Checks if a user is blacklisted.
      Parameter:
      user - the UserDTO of the user
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the user is blacklisted, false otherwise

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String username, String password)
      Retrieves a user based on username and password.
      Parameter:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Gibt zurück:
      the user, or null if no match is found

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(User user, String rawPassword)
      Verifies if a raw password matches the user's encoded password.
      Parameter:
      user - the user
      rawPassword - the raw password
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the passwords match, false otherwise

    • updatePassword

      public void updatePassword(User user, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a user.
      Parameter:
      user - the user
      newPassword - the new password
